golden_diagnosis: 法布雷病/Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease,法布雷病/Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease,法布雷病/Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease
predict_diagnosis:
1. Alport syndrome, X-linked
2. Autosomal recessive polycystic kidney disease (ARPKD)
3. Membranous nephropathy
4. Focal segmental glomerulosclerosis (FSGS)
5. IgA nephropathy
6. hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM)
7. Brugada syndrome
8. Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia (ARVD/C)
9. Syndrome of inappropriate antidiuretic hormone (SIADH)
10. Chronic kidney disease (CKD) with secondary hypertension

Please note that the provided list is based on the patient's phenotype and should be considered as a starting point for further evaluation and confirmation by appropriate tests and consultations with specialists. It is essential to exclude other possible causes and monitor for any overlapping symptoms or complications.
